description: A volume populated with the contents of a git repository. Git repo volumes do not support ownership management. Git repo volumes support SELinux relabeling. GitRepo is DEPRECATED. To provision a container with a git repo, mount an `emptyDir` into an `initContainer` that clones the repo using git, then mount the `emptyDir` into the Pod's container.

directory.description: Target directory name. Must not contain or start with `".."`.  If `"."` is supplied, the volume directory will be the git repository. Otherwise, if specified, the volume will contain the git repository in the subdirectory with the given name.

revision.description: Commit hash for the specified revision.
